JK Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Security Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 15:56 IST
 Bank Jobs
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Jammu and Kashmir |  Salary : 45,000 to 45,000




FOLLOW

The Jammu & Kashmir Bank (JK Bank) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Security Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the JK Bank Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Jammu & Kashmir.

JK Bank Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Security Officer	02	Any Degree

JK Bank Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 62 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

JK Bank Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

JK Bank Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee for all candidates: Rs. 500/-.

JK Bank Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 45,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the JK Bank Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the JK Bank Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	01-08-2025
Closing date	31-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Extended notification	Click Here
